title: Noam Chomsky personal interview at MIT
description:
An interview with Professor Noam Chomsky at his MIT office in the department of Linguistics. We ask him several questions on capitalism, cognition and society in general. He takes us through his views on structures of authority domination and the human mind along with some personal insights.

Apologies for the audio, there were various background noises that i tried to edit out to the best of my abilities!
